description: The Japanese Painted Fern (Athyrium niponicum var. pictum 'Ursula's Red') is an amazing fern that adds a magical pop of color to any garden. Its deep purple-red fronds are adorned with dainty, dusty-gray painted striping for an added charming touch. It flourishes best in shady spots such as beneath a shade tree and requires minimal maintenance to stay healthy. As an added bonus â€” new fronds will emerge bronzy-red in color and then slowly mature to a deep purple making for a captivating display. It is perfect for adding a special touch to any garden or outdoor space.
